summary: A nerdy college student is pressured to help a jock write love letters to the campus beauty, even though the nerd is in love with her himself.
cast: Louie Bonanno|Tracey Adams|Jim Abele|Veronica Hart|Eddie Prevot|Derrick R. Roberts|Philip Campanaro|Michael Heintzman|Douglas Gibson|Edward R. Mallia|Steven Shaw|Jeanne Marie|Gretchen Kingsley|Everett Sherman Jr.|Thomas K. Belgrey|W.P. Dremak|Jane Kreisel|Lauren Stewart|Andy Nichols|Harvey Irwin|Frank Cole|Frank Mancuso|Adam Fried|Joseph Z. Pritchard|Annie Sprinkle|Nina Preta|Jeanna Fine|Mary Hunter|Janne Dalen|Angela Venise|Helena Lea|Gina Menza|Carmel Pugh|Siobhan Hunter|Jonathan Buck|Sam Farrell|Joseph Cummings|Modetso Orozco III|Chuck Vincent|Doreen Dolan|Kathy Reif|Dulce Mann|Kevin Chin|Ha To O|Theresa London
title: Wimps
